title: tyAgarAja svAmi
sahitya:
tyAgarAja svAmi padAmbujam dinamum paNI manamE (sadguru) gAnalOla


anupallavi

  yAga yOga sAdhanai inriyE sAkEtAdhipan darishanam kaNDa


caraNam    kAvEri tIrattil kanindu manamurugi dEvAdi dEvan pAvana nAmattai
 dhyAnam sheidiniya gAnam sheidu pAril kaDaittEra namakkuyar gAnAmudam tanda
